entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
